stories.Title: Roadster for all
stories.Description: Tesla sure has a way of catching us off guard. CEO Elon Musk has announced that they're completely open-sourcing Roadster's original design, giving fans a glimpse into their history.
stories.Tweet: Roadster for all 📦 Tesla sure has a way of catching us off guard. CEO Elon Musk has announced that they're completely open-sourcing Roadster's original design, giving fans a glimpse into their history. #tesla https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1727392569238159491?s=20

stories.Title: Time to slow down
stories.Description: Ford is taking a step back by adjusting its investment and hiring plans for its upcoming Michigan battery plant, aligning with shifts in EV demand and labor costs.
stories.Tweet: Time to slow down 📦 Ford is taking a step back by adjusting its investment and hiring plans for its upcoming Michigan battery plant, aligning with shifts in EV demand and labor costs. #ford https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/22/23972680/ford-michigan-ev-battery-plant-reduction-plans

stories.Title: Heading to the electric future
stories.Description: Nissan is serious about electrification, targeting a fully electric lineup in Europe by 2030. They recently unveiled plans for three new EVs and an additional gigafactory to support their ambitions.
stories.Tweet: Heading to the electric future 📦 Nissan is serious about electrification, targeting a fully electric lineup in Europe by 2030. They recently unveiled plans for three new EVs and an additional gigafactory to support their ambitions. #nissan https://electrek.co/2023/11/24/nissan-confirms-3-new-evs-and-its-next-gigafactory-location/

stories.Title: Here comes Skye
stories.Description: There's an EV for everyone, especially for those looking for an extraordinary blend of elegance and off-road performance. Check out the Callum Skye, the marvel of Callum Designs.
stories.Tweet: Here comes Skye 📦 There's an EV for everyone, especially for those looking for an extraordinary blend of elegance and off-road performance. stories.Title: Competition? No problem
stories.Description: Volkswagen is unwilling to be intimidated by competition, especially in its most important market. The automaker is slashing prices on its electric lineup to appeal to more buyers in China.
stories.Tweet: Competition? No problem 📦 Volkswagen is unwilling to be intimidated by competition, especially in its most important market. stories.Title: Just ask Bard
stories.Description: Bard is taking engagement with YouTube videos to the next level. Google has announced that users can now extract information from videos by asking the chatbot about any specific detail.

stories.Title: Adobe keeps moving
stories.Description: Adobe continues to advance its AI efforts in content creation. With the recent acquisition of Rephrase, a text-to-video company, the software giant aims to improve the Creative Cloud experience.
stories.Tweet: Adobe keeps moving 📦 Adobe continues to advance its AI efforts in content creation. stories.Title: In search of clarity?
stories.Description: We have almost wrapped up a week packed with AI updates. If tech jargon seems like a foreign language to you, take a moment to explore this comprehensive list of AI terms.

stories.Title: The mystery prevails
stories.Description: OpenAI's saga is now sailing into calmer waters, but one question remains: What was the real reason behind Sam Altman's temporary departure? Sources say it was an alleged breakthrough named Q*.
stories.Tweet: The mystery prevails 📦 OpenAI's saga is now sailing into calmer waters, but one question remains: What was the real reason behind Sam Altman's temporary departure? stories.Title: AI gets to the Prix
stories.Description: Precision is everything in Formula 1. That's why the FIA has announced the trial of an AI system at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, aimed at improving track limit evaluations.
stories.Tweet: AI gets to the Prix 📦 Precision is everything in Formula 1. That's why the FIA has announced the trial of an AI system at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, aimed at improving track limit evaluations. #ai https://www.engadget.com/formula-1-hopes-ai-will-help-it-figure-out-if-a-car-breaks-track-limits-191546853.html

stories.Title: Charting a new course
stories.Description: After conquering suborbital space a few times, Virgin Galactic is bidding farewell to its VSS Unity to make room for the Delta class vehicle, aiming to offer larger capacity and more frequent flights.
stories.Tweet: Charting a new course 📦 After conquering suborbital space a few times, Virgin Galactic is bidding farewell to its VSS Unity to make room for the Delta class vehicle, aiming to offer larger capacity and more frequent flights. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/virgin-galactic-delta-spaceplane-upgrade-profitability-1851042915

stories.Title: Following the stainless trend
stories.Description: China isn't dragging behind, and it's ready to come up with its own version of Starship. The Chinese startup Landspace has revealed its plans for the Zhuque-3, a reusable stainless steel rocket.
stories.Tweet: Following the stainless trend 📦 China isn't dragging behind, and it's ready to come up with its own version of Starship. The Chinese startup Landspace has revealed its plans for the Zhuque-3, a reusable stainless steel rocket. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/chinas-landspace-aims-to-build-a-stainless-steel-rocket/

stories.Title: Good luck Ariane 6!
stories.Description: Following a few setbacks in Europe's space plans, the Ariane 6 heavy-lift rocket is set for a significant engine test today, bringing it closer to its debut liftoff in 2024.
stories.Tweet: Good luck Ariane 6! 📦 Following a few setbacks in Europe's space plans, the Ariane 6 heavy-lift rocket is set for a significant engine test today, bringing it closer to its debut liftoff in 2024. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/europe-ariane-6-rocket-test-fire-november-2023

stories.Title: Ariane keeps on advancing
stories.Description: Gracefully, the Ariane 6 prototype has successfully passed a crucial test with the full firing of its Vulcain 2.1 engine. It's another step toward Europe getting independent access to space.
stories.Tweet: Ariane keeps on advancing 📦 Gracefully, the Ariane 6 prototype has successfully passed a crucial test with the full firing of its Vulcain 2.1 engine. It's another step toward Europe getting independent access to space. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/ariane-6-completes-long-duration-static-fire-test/

stories.Title: A surprise from Mercury
stories.Description: Scientists have revealed one of Mercury's most hidden secrets: salt glaciers. Despite its extreme environment, this planet may hold the potential for life beyond Earth.
stories.Tweet: A surprise from Mercury 📦 Scientists have revealed one of Mercury's most hidden secrets: salt glaciers. Despite its extreme environment, this planet may hold the potential for life beyond Earth. #space https://interestingengineering.com/science/salt-glacier-on-mercury-may-support-life

stories.Title: Unlocking its potential
stories.Description: In the ever-evolving tech landscape, "quantum" emerges as a defining term. The quest for quantum advantage is the next leap in computing, solving problems their classical counterparts can't touch.

stories.Title: A mind of its own
stories.Description: A recent Cambridge study suggests that AI isn't that different from us after all. By introducing physical constraints, their artificial system mirrors key traits found in human brains.
stories.Tweet: A mind of its own 📦 A recent Cambridge study suggests that AI isn't that different from us after all. stories.Description: The Telescope Array Collaboration found a groundbreaking phenomenon—a cosmic ray with an unprecedented energy level. Yet, the mystery deepens as scientists remain uncertain about its origins.

stories.Title: Similar to the Red Planet
stories.Description: China's space ambitions shift to Mars with the development of a numerical model of its atmosphere. This advancement is set to enhance the upcoming Tianwen-3 mission's performance.

stories.Title: I do have one question
stories.Description: There's a slight change in Google Meet that might transform your next meeting. Now, every time you have a question, you can simply raise your hand physically instead of clicking a button.
stories.Tweet: I do have one question 📦 There's a slight change in Google Meet that might transform your next meeting. title: OpenAI's mystery, Ariane 6 triumphs, F1 turns to AI
description: We've finally reached the end of a very tumultuous week! But you know, there are still some mysteries lingering, like the real story behind Sam Altman's sudden exit... Word on the street is something called Q*. Sending good vibes to Europe as they inch closer to space - ESA shared that the Ariane 6 prototype aced a big test. And guess what's getting a dash of AI magic? Unexpectedly, Formula 1.
